name: proto-card
description:
Please, do report to us any bug you find on the desktop versions, so we can make the game more stable.

Some information that are missing on the game:

- The enemy with 5/5 moves twice, so it can move and attack or attack twice if close enough;

- The enemy with 10/10 moves once;

- The enemy 3/3 moves once, but has an attack range of 3 lanes.
